name: poseidon-syntax

0.3.0.name: poseidon-syntax
0.3.0.description: A dark, subtle highlighting theme for your enjoyment.

readme:
# Poseidon Syntax Theme

The design of this syntax theme is to offer a dark, subtle
color palette. Syntax highlighting focuses on actually highlighting
the important language constructs, and using bold font weight to emphasize
other important parts.

This theme was crafted with love, and with inspiration from
the Chestnut Light Theme and the DuoTone Dark Sea theme.

Much thanks to both of their authors!
